meanings.definition: To impregnate or combine with silica.
meanings.sent1: The volcanic eruption silicified the surrounding rocks with molten silica.
meanings.sent2: The scientist discovered a way to silicify the metal, making it more durable.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient was a special powder that could silicify any dish!
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two friends seemed to silicify over time, becoming unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The potion had the power to silicify any object it touched, turning it into a glass-like material.
